title: South American Worlds Open for Transfer
richText:
Attention players from South America!

You can currently save 50 % on South America Character World Transfers and Express South America Character World Transfers in the Store. < br > < br > Use them to transfer a character from a North American or European world to one of the five new South American worlds to improve your connection quality: < /td>

Gentebra (Optional PvP), Kalibra (Optional PvP), Inabra (Open PvP),
Quelibra (Open PvP) or Lutabra (Retro Open PvP).

This sale only runs until JANUARY 17, 2018, 10:00 CET, so be quick!
